```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(primer.data)
```

```{r}
q <- read_csv("data/nyc_tracts.csv")

# Convert med_income to numeric

# $ goes into a specific column in the csv file
q$med_income <- as.numeric(q$med_income)

# Create the plot
ggplot(q, aes(x = tract, y = med_income, fill = race)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 10, hjust = 1)) +
  labs(title = "Median Income by Race and Census Tract",
       x = "Census Tract",
       y = "Median Income ($)",
       fill = "Race")
```
